content: Love it!
replyContent: Thanks Matt!  I'm working on a really cool new feature coming soon!

content: Love the app, but I have a question. I recently got a new phone, the app didn't transfer over. I have lost all of my games. Is there a way to retrieve that?
replyContent: Hi Marsha.  Yes, on your old phone there is an option to backup your database to an external location.  Then on your new phone you can import the database.   Email me if you need more help.

content: Love it!!!!!
replyContent: Thank you Chris!  Glad you like the app!

content: This app is so easy to use and he is so responsive to any questions you may have. Easiest way to analyze your bowling game. Haven't tried the multiple users yet. I don't give out 5 stars but this app deserves it!
replyContent: Thanks Todd!  Really appreciate the nice review!

content: Love this app.
replyContent: Thanks Russ!

content: Great app! It lets me track everything that I want. Makes me wish I bowled more so I could track more.
replyContent: Thanks for the nice review Bryan!

content: Love the new feature of being able to keep teams win or loses. If you have the one for 1 bowler max can you add the team members to it.
replyContent: Thanks Dennis.  Yes, all team features work with single bowlers.

content: EXCELLENT communication, a designer with patience and heart! Great app, does way more than I need! Very powerful and once you get the hang of it it is a must have/use!!! Thank you Steve!!!
replyContent: Thanks Margery! I appreciate the really nice review! Feel free to reach out with any additional questions.

content: Great app can put a lot of information and sometimes it distracts from bowling because all of the information you can input. One thing I would like to see under league is a category for subbing
replyContent: Hi Bob.  Thanks for the review.  Subbing is on the list of enhancements,  but feel free to email me some additional feedback with some of your thoughts.  tbefeedback@gmail.com

content: Love the app. Love the ability to capture multiple leagues per week especially the ability to add notes per frame. I add which ball, where I start on the approach, which board I hit, the target and the results. The problem is when I get home to review my league results the notes are not available for review. There are a lot of stats but I need the notes. The notes would help me to determine which balls I need to use at which house, what is working and what is not.
replyContent: Hi Rita.  Thanks for the review.  The frame notes are available for review.   Under Metrics and Reporting, choose a game number and click Frame Attributes.  You will see the attributes for every frame including notes.  Drop me a note if this is not what you're looking for.

content: Gives me accurate stat keeping at my fingertips. Only a couple of slight issues that may be me not sure on how to do it but setting up my daughter's High School league to play multiple matches in a week doesn't seem to work. I have to basically set up her 10 game schedule as 10 weeks and I'm also having trouble getting the stats emailed to the people that I want to see them. None of the actual stats are being attached when sent. Any help with that would be appreciated. Otherwise it's perfect
replyContent: Hello.  Glad you like the app.  Please send me a note at tbefeedback.com.  I can help you get what you need for your daughters high school league as well as ensure you can share your stats.

content: I can no longer track three games in my second league. This is an app killing bug now. *Update* Love this App, and even got a response from the developer. Didn't reach out because I figured out the issue. Somehow the app changed my settings to 1 game for league. Changed it back now works fine. Not sure if there is bug info I can submit or not. But that's a particularly annoying one.
replyContent: Hi Jeremy, thanks for the response.  Glad you got it figured out.  Feel free to email me with any additional information.   I certainly want to make sure I resolve any issues that may be out there!

content: I use this app to track everything for bowling and it helps me keep track of what I need to work on. The only thing missing is a easy way to select which bowling ball out if my preferred bowling ball list that I'm gonna use for that game and track that statistic. Even make it so that you can make a ball switch mid game. I know there is a way to select what ball you are using already but it's too difficult to keep going back to when in some cases I use the same ball for a large number of frames.
replyContent: Hi David.  Thanks for the review.  There are two ways to do what you're asking.  1) Under Game Attributes, use Primary Ball to track a single ball for a whole game.  2) if you will be swapping balls, use Default Attributes.  You can set the ball and the app will automatically carry it from frame to frame.  Email me with questions.  Thanks!

content: Awesome score/pin tracker!
replyContent: Thank you Gail.  Whole lot more great enhancements are coming!

content: It's a great tool to use when reviewing what I've done in the past.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Alan!

content: this app has worked perfectly since day one.
replyContent: Hi Jerome.  Thanks for the review!

content: Looks like it has a lot of features, but the UI didn't suit me. The text size was very small and in some places used black text on a red or green background which was difficult to read. I would have preferred if it followed Google's Material design guidelines.
replyContent: Hi Mark.  Thanks for the feedback.  Send me an email at tbefeedback.com and let me know where the font and/or colors should be improved.  Appreciate your help!

content: helps alot on keeping track of my improvement as a bowler

Outstanding bowling scorekeeping & data analyzing software. Gives you reports on almost anything such as spare conversions. You can easily make changes to frames if you put in the wrong data. Has a section for notes where you can include any data you like, such as the pattern you bowled on and the ball(s) you used. Software has worked flawlessly for me with no bugs. Highly recommended.
replyContent: Hi James.  Thanks for the awesome review!  I have a new release coming shortly with a great new feature that will allow you to understand your game at a deeper level.  Thanks again!

content: Loving the app. It's doing everything that is advertised and more! Thanks.
replyContent: Thanks Kenny!  New release coming real soon with additional features to analyze your game.  Enjoy the app!

content: i find this app to be very user friendly an easy to use. creator is always upgrading it to include new features which are really beneficial. Great for tracking both my league play and open play with all the information i like to track and is helping me to improve my scores and game.
replyContent: Thanks for the nice review Larry.  Really glad you find the app helpful.  Let me know if you have any ideas for enhancements.   More coming soon!

content: Amazing! This app is incredible. It has so many features that are very in depth. I am truly amazed of all the things it can do. Since I am a full time bowler, it is a perfect app for me.
replyContent: Hi Christina.   What a nice review.  Thank you.  I have a really great enhancement coming that gives you more even  insight into how well you throw the ball.  It should be released in a few weeks.  Thanks again!

content: Great app, great support for the developer. Must have if you want to keep track of your bowling stats.
replyContent: Thanks Keith.  Glad you like the app.  More good stuff coming!

content: Great app! It takes some figuring out. But, once you get it all sorted out it's super user friendly. I've recommended it to everyone I bowl with on my leagues.
replyContent: Thanks Will!  Glad you like the app!

content: works great!
replyContent: Thanks Bill!  So glad you enjoy the app!

content: I really enjoy this app. Between my leagues and my daughters school/ jr bowling leagues it's great. The only thing I would like to see (unless I just dont know how to do it) is to be able to track what ball is used during each game. I also havent figured out of there is a way to show pocket hits , brooklyn etc. Still an awesome app
replyContent: Hello Jason.  Thanks for the nice review.  On the Bowl form, click the GA image.  Game Attributes will open and you can select a ball.  If you want to specify a specific ball for a specific  frame, click the FA image and Frame Attributes will open.  Email me and I'll explain additional options.

content: Great app! nothing to complain about.
replyContent: Thank you!  So glad you are enjoying the app!

content: Great functional app. Developer listens and takes feedback to heart and constantly updates. He is very nice and even helped me with another app totally unrelated to this one. THANK YOU!
replyContent: Thanks Ken.  I appreciate the kind words.  A new release is coming shortly and I hope your app is coming along well!

content: This latest update is pretty good. I like all the new features you have added and they work really well. Kepp up the good work.
replyContent: Glad you like the app Andrew!  Please let me know if you have any ideas for new features.

content: Terrific app.
replyContent: Thanks Hubert!  More goodness coming soon!

content: I really like this. I wish it had a running league average for the league on the league game recap. Along with the average for the night. But this app is still the best I have used. Way to go thanks. You guys are awesome.
replyContent: Hello Nick.  I think that was a great idea.  In v2.9.0 I implemented your idea.  There is now a running league recap, and I also added weekly and running average charts.

content: Great App! I used this everytime I bowl, love that I can store my games and refer to the data and statistics when necessary.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Jahmali.  Glad you like the app.  Another release coming in a couple of weeks with more enhancements.

content: I can't enter a travel league into the app. The league bowls at a different center each week, so it won't allow me to add the league until I choose a bowling center. The app should either allow me to leave it blank or include an option for travel, then let me choose the correct center I'm bowling at each week.
replyContent: Hi Brian.  The app does support multi-center.  On the Setup League form you can select the default center.  When you start a new week of league bowling,  there is a drop down where you can Override the default center to the center you're bowling at that week.

content: Takes a bit to learn how to use it, but it's worth it. Tons of options to analyze your bowling results.
replyContent: Thanks Jason!  Glad you like the app.  More coming!

content: Absolutely a perfect bowling tracker. Does everything I could think to ask of it.
replyContent: Thank you Seth!  If you do think if more, let me know.  There is more coming!

content: Great app for my application
Great program but would be great if you could override games during league. I have one that has four games on position rounds which makes tracking a little difficult.
replyContent: Hello Kevin.  If you're saying most weeks you have 3 games, and position is 4, then you can set games per week to 4 when setting up league  and only enter scores for first 3 games on non position round.  There's another option as well.  Email me for more details.

content: I've been using the app for league play for two weeks, and I really enjoy being able to track my progress while I'm bowling. I'm coming back to the game after a four-year hiatus, which required me to replace a lot of my equipment. I especially like being able to assign a shot to a specific bowling ball. As I get more comfortable, I'll incorporate more detail like my starting and target board. A very happy customer...
replyContent: Neil, thanks for the nice review!  Glad you are enjoying the app.  More enhancements coming.   Feel free to email any new ideas I can incorporate into the app.  Thanks again!

content: Great tracker
The app hasn't let me enter my scores since I had it. Once I pick the league and enter the date, it won't let me see it a bowler. I have wasted weeks of not capturing my scores
replyContent: Hello Antonio.   I wish you would have emailed me with this question.  You probably did not add yourself to the league you setup.  Under Manage Bowlers, select yourself, click edit. Then there is pushbutton to select  leagues you are bowling in. You can also do this in League Setup.  There is a menu item to Associate Bowlers.

content: I really like the app, just wish i could erase a frame instead of deleting a whole game snd starting over...
replyContent: Hello Shannon.  You can erase a frame.  Simply long click the frame to erase and a menu will pop up allowing you to edit or delete a frame.  In that same menu you can also add frame notes.  Thanks!

content: Extremely capable bowling score tracker app. I use it for keeping scores of everyone on our team for league play. Developer is very responsive and receptive to adding new features!
replyContent: Hey Ed!  Good to hear from you and thanks for the nice review.  More great enhancements coming!  Let me know if you need anything.

content:
I am using this summer to fine tune my game...this app does all the hard 
work for me. I just enter my pincount and all of the stats are produced. I 
love that I can literally get any info I want for my league play and 
opening bowling...cant wait to use it more :)
replyContent: Hello Kimberly.  Thanks for the nice review.  I'm glad you are enjoying the app.  I'm working on a new release that will enhance reporting.  Should be released in about a week.  Let me know if you have any suggestions for making the app better.  Thanks!  Steve

content:
When someone puts a lot of effort and practicality in a software, it shows. 
Great app and great potential for future improvements! Worth the support!
replyContent: Thanks for the kind review Therion!  Please reach out if you have any thoughts on how to make the app even better!

content:
App is great! I use it every week for league. Had an issue with a previous 
update, but the developer implemented a fix right away! Seems to be working 
like it should with the most recent update (version 2.1.1) on 4/25/18. I 
highly recommend this app for keeping track of bowling scores.
replyContent:
Hey Bandit.  I have found the issue.   It is a defect in the Android 8.0 framework.  It's all over the developer community begging Google to fix.  In the meantime, I have implemented a work around and have deployed to Google Play.  It should be available soon.  It will be version
 2.1.1.  So sorry for the inconvenience.

content: In my immediate previous review, I meant to say that many BOWLER'S (not dollars) are just invested in whatever bowling program they have used before because of the accumulation of statistics  And having just started recently with a program this one is by far the best because of its detail
replyContent: Hello 'Yard Work'.  Thanks so much for the review.  So glad you are enjoying the app.   I am working on a couple of new features.  Should be deploying soon.  Please let me know if you have any new ideas for the app.   Thanks again!

content: Just started using it and so far so good. Seems like a we'll put together app and great for Bowlers who want to keep track of their stats.
replyContent: Hi Jason.  Thanks so much for the review.  Glad you like BDSS!  Please email me with any questions on how to use the app or any thoughts on how to make it better.

content: Bowl! Drill! Score! Stat! is a very full featured bowling score and stat keeping Application.  I've been using this app for a few months now, It's easy to use & edit, keeps track of a wide range of data and it can generate and share a wide range of reports.  I would suggest looking it over carefully before first use (like most things) and familiarize yourself with the layout and use of it's features.  The ability to set-up practice drills and the built-in bowling ball speed calculator are nice extras.  Bowl! Drill! Score! Stat! is easily better than (or at least equal too) other similar and more expensive apps. Plus it's being actively developed and updated as of the time of this review.  It's a 5 star App, well worth getting if your into tracking your bowling stat's.
replyContent: Hi Al,  So glad you like BDSS!  And there is more to come.  I'm currently working on more detailed frame level reports and a few other things.   I appreciate the very nice review.  Reach out to me if you have any ideas.

content: Badly needs an edit option.i did 1 mistake and that ruined the whole thing. Now have to wait till the start of next year and try again
replyContent: Hello Rik, the app has an edit option.  Simply long click the frame and you have the ability to Edit the frame.  Through that same mechanism, you can delete a frame or add notes to a frame.   Please let me know if you have other questions.  Feel free to email me with any help you may need.  Steve

content: Best bowling tracker out there. Love it. There is nothing program cannot do. I am using it to track my daughters bowling. Easy to use and the reports pull quickly. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
replyContent: Thanks Todd.  Glad you and your daughter like it.  Please let me know if you have ideas to make BDSS! even better.

content: Great app for easy score keeping. Keeps track of scores and stats for future review. Would highly recommend for both experienced bowlers and for those who are eager to learn
replyContent: Thanks Logan.  BDSS! was targeted for new and experienced bowlers.  Appreciate the review and enjoy BDSS!
